attributes.action: Recognise John Conteh's Sporting ( Boxing ) achievments.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is a man who has achieved what many would like to,By way of the fact that he is the former British ,European,Commonwealth and world Light Heavy Wieght Champion..That was undisputed.That I feel is worthy of some kind of recognition.Without what he now does for charity's such as the Variety Club , and is always ready to help and advise youngsters in the sport.
